about_info1: Ebosi was founded by Oathen Group LLC, a company existing since 2019. We have been in the NEMT business since our inception and have provided excellent service within the Houston Area.
about_info2: Our traditional model of business brought about the founding of Ebosi which is today a leading NEMT rideshare solution ready to change 'the status quo'
fair_price_desc: Ebosi has evolved into a comprehensive platform, extending beyond ride-hailing to deliver affordable, honest, and ethical services to global communities.
mission_vission_desc1: Our focus is to improve the quality and effectiveness of the healthcare service industry with technology while maintaining industry and security standards.
mission_vission_desc2: By 2030 We will be the world's leading healthcare service solution provider
